strapiPost.title: New Exhibition In Famous Hardware Co. Windows In Springdale
strapiPost.content:
The Famous Hardware Building in Downtown Springdale has a new window display for passersby to admire. 

  • Connected: This time around, the windows have been brought to life by a sculptor and educator whose sewn inflatable sculptures use animals, plants, minerals, and the bacterial world to address human qualities and relationships.
  • Through the glass: The installation is called The Body Overwhelms and will be visible from the sidewalk infant of the building on 113 W Emma Ave through mid-August. The artist will be in Downtown Springdale on July 14 for an artist talk.

For more information, click HERE.
